title: David Tennant and Crowley's World (Behind the Scenes of "Good Omens")
author: Just Tennant
comment:
“It’s a story about a couple, they hide their relationship from their parents too long, cause their families don’t like eachother. Little bit like Romeo and Juliet, but it’s Romeo and Romeo. Oh yeah, there’s the end of the world too.”
Good Omens synopsis in my shipping brain.
David does a good job on hiding his Scottish accent.
“And the’ s formed sort of a codependent relationship.”     Codependent: characterized by excessive emotional or psychological reliance on a partner
David describing Crowley as having "swagger" made me smile.
No matter if you are human, angel, or demon, we will always mourn when our car falls apart.
description: David Tennant speaks a bit about his character Crowley from "Good Omens" (2019) intercut with some scenes from the miniseries in this little DVD extra. Subtitles have been added.
